refnamediv.refpurpose: resets the state of the string_output object

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function resets the state of the string output object. The string associated with the string output is dropped and is of 0 characters after this call.

refsect2.title: stream
refsect2.para: stream to clear, must have been created by the string_output function.

example.title: Flush the String Output Stream
example.programlisting:
<?vsp
    declare ses nay;
    ses := string_output ();
    http ('this text never be displayed' , ses);
    string_output_flush (ses);
    http ('stream test' , ses);
    http (string_output_string (ses));
  ?>
